definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pursue, chase, persecute (NH id., Aram. [[רְדַף]], rdap; Ar. radafa; Sab. [[רדף]] id., Sab Denkm:No. 7, 1. 2);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: :128 Pf. 3 ms. ´[[ר]]: Ju Jdg 4:16 +; 1 S. [[וְרָדַפְתִּ֫י]] Je 29:18, etc.; Impf. [[יִרְדּׂף]] De 19:6 +, [[יִֽרַדּׂף]] Ps 7:6 (appar. to give choice of Qal or Pi, Ki JHMich Bae al.; Ges:§ 63 n expl. as developed from [[יִרֲדׂף]], cf. Ol:§ 236 e, and, further, Kö:i. 160), sf. [[יִרְ דְָּפֶָךָ]] Ez Eze 35:6, Eze 35:6, etc.; Imv. ms. [[רְדׂף]] Ge 44:4 +, sf. [[רָדְפֵחוּ]] Ps 34:15; mpl. [[רִדְפוּ]] Ju Jdg 3:28 +; Inf. cstr. [[רָדְפִף]] Jos 8:16 +, [[מִרְדׂף]] 1Sa 23:28, 2Sa 18:16, sf. [[רָדְפִי]] Ps 38:21 Qr, [[רדופי]] Kt, etc.; Pt. [[רׂדֵף]] Ju Jdg 4:22 +, pl. [[רׂדְפִים]] Jdg 8:4 +;—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: pursue (sts. + [[הִשִּׂיג]]): lit. c. [[אַחֲרֵי]] pers., in order to overtake Ge 44:4 (J), 2Ki 5:21; esp. with hostile purpose Ge 31:23 (+ [[הִדְבִּיק]]), Ge 35:5, Jos 24:6 (all E), Jos 2:5, Jos 2:7, Jos 2:7, Jos 8:16, Jos 8:16, Jos 8:17, Jos 10:19 (JE), De 11:4, De 19:6, Jos 20:5 (all D), Ex 14:4, Ex 14:8, Ex 14:9 (P), Ju Jdg 1:6, 2Sa 20:6, 2Sa 20:7, 2Sa 20:10, 2Sa 20:13, 2Ki 9:27 + 17 t., + 2Ki 25:5 ([[אַחַר]]), + Ju Jdg 4:16 ([[אַחֲרֵי הָרֶכֶב]]); + [[רִדְפוּ אַחֲרֵי]] Ju Jdg 3:28 = follow me (as leader; but this meaning not elsewhere; rd. [[רְדוּ]] LXX Kit GFM).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: lit., c. acc. pers., put to flight, chase (defeated foe; sts. c. [[הִשִּׁיג]]): Am 1:11, Ho 8:3, De 32:30 (poem; ‖[[הֵנִיס ]]), De 28:22, De 28:45, Jos 23:10 (D), Le 26:8, Le 26:8 (H); [[וְרָדַף אׂתָם קוֹל]] [[עָלֶה נִדָּף]] v:Le 26:36 a (H); Jos 7:5, Jos 8:24, Jos 10:10, Jos 11:8 (all JE), Ge 14:15, De 1:44, Ju Jdg 4:22, Is 41:3 + 13 t. + Ju Jdg 7:25 (rd. [[אֶת־]] for [[אֶל־]], LXX Vulgate Targum GFM Bu Now). †

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: pursue, in fig., Je 20:11, La 4:19, [[רִדְפוּ וְתִפְשׂוּהוּ]] Ps 71:11, cf. La 1:3; Ps 7:6 (+ [[הִשִּׂיג]]; v. supr.); esp. subj. ´[[י]]:, pursue (fig. of punishment, judgment), c. acc. pers. Je 29:18 ([[בַּחֶרֶב]]), La 3:43 and ([[בְּאַף]]) v:La 3:66, Ps 83:16 ([[בְּסַעֲרֶָךָ]]); [[אֶת־קַשׁ יָבֵשׁ תִּרְדּׂף]] Job 13:25 ([[תַּעַרוֹ ץ]]); [[רׂדְפָם]], of ´[[מַלְאַךְ י]]:, Ps 35:6. †

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: fig. persecute, harass, c. acc. pers. De 30:7, Job 19:22 ([[כְּמוֹ־אֵל]]), Ps 69:27, Ps 109:16, Ps 119:86, Ps 119:161; c. acc. [[נַפְשִׁי]] Ps 143:3, c. acc. [[נֲדִבָתִי]] Job 30:15 (but subj. obscure; read perh. [[תֵּרָדֵף]] Bu; Du [[תִּנָּדֵף]]); c. [[ל]] pers. Job 19:28; pt. as subst. Je 15:15, Je 17:18, Ps 7:2, Ps 31:16 (‖[[אוֹיְבַי ]]; We [[מְרַדְּפָָי]] for [[וַרׂדְפָָי]]), Ps 35:3, Ps 119:84, Ps 119:157 (+ [[חָרַי]]), Ps 142:7. †

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: pursue, dog, subj. [[דָּם]], c. acc. pers. Ez Eze 35:6, Eze 35:6 (del v:a LXX Co Toy Krae); in good sense, attend closely upon, [[טוֹב וָחֶסֶד]] [[יִרְדְּפוּנִי]] Ps 23:6. †

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: pass.: Pf. 1 pl. [[עַל־חַוָּארֵנוּ נִרְדָָּפְנוּ]] La 5:5 upon our neck (i.e. closely) we are pursued (improb., cf. Bu); perh. Impf. 3 fs. [[תֵּרָדֵף]] Job 30:15 Bu (for [[תִּרְדּׂף]]); Pt. ´[[א]]: [[יְבַקֵּשׁ אֶת־נִרְדָָּף]] Ec 3:15 God seeketh the pursued (i.e. what has disappeared, is past, but dub.). †

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. consec. [[וְרִדְּפָה]] Ho 2:9; Impf. 3 ms. [[יְרַדֶּף־]] Na 1:8 (Ps 7:6 v.

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: ); 3 fs. [[תְּרַדֵּף]] Pr 13:21; Pt. [[מְרֵדֵּף־]] Pr 11:19 +;—pursue ardently, c. acc. pers. Ho 2:9 (in fig.); fig. also [[חשֶׁךְ]] ´[[יְר]]: Na 1:8 (Gunk:ZAW xiii (1893), 230, plausibly, [[יֶהְדּׂף]]), cf. Pr 13:31; elsewhere pt., in Pr: aim (eagerly) to secure, c. acc. [[רָעָה]] Pr 11:19, [[רֵיקִים]] Pr 12:11, Pr 28:19, [[אֲמָרִים]] Pr 19:7 (mng. dub., v. Toy); in good sense, [[חְדָקָה]] Pr 15:9. †

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. consec. [[וְרֻדַּף כְמׂץ הָרִים]] Is 17:13 it shall be chased away like chaff of the mountains (‖[[וְנָס ]]). †

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[הִרְּדִיפֻהוּ]] Ju Jdg 20:43 usu. they chased him (Benj., coll.), but strange after [[כִתְּרוּ]] surrounded (still stranger after [[כתתו]] or [[כרתו]] LXX), and why Hiph.? GFM conj. dittogr. of [[הִדְרִיכֻהוּ]] foll.; the reverse conjectured by Bu Now.
